references.paper_title: Pre-train, prompt, and predict: A systematic survey of prompting methods in natural language processing
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of prompting methods in natural language processing, which is the foundation of the research presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Automatic topography of high-dimensional data sets by non-parametric density peak clustering
references.reason: This paper introduces the Advanced Density Peaks algorithm used for the density-based clustering analysis of the hidden representations in the studied LLMs.

references.paper_title: Intrinsic dimension of data representations in deep neural networks
references.reason: This paper explores the concept of intrinsic dimensionality in deep neural networks and its relation to information processing stages, which is relevant to the analysis of LLM representations.

references.paper_title: Probing classifiers: Promises, shortcomings, and advances
references.reason: This review paper discusses the methodology of probing classifiers to analyze the linguistic information encoded in token representations, which is used in this paper as a basis for analyzing LLM hidden layers.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the LoRA method used for parameter-efficient fine-tuning, one of the key methods compared in this paper.
